daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez consults with a security expert about the vulnerabilities found on his server and how to patch them, and applies the patches to her server.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez gets his server hacked and asks a security expert to diagnose and method for patch the vulnerability.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez listens to the security expert and applies the patch to her server, making the server more secure.
